author: Staff Reporter
text:
The photo of a question in the English Part II paper of the Class XII State Board examinations has been doing the rounds on the social media application WhatsApp over the last two days.

The photo shows a multiple choice question where the students have been asked the choice of alcoholic beverage a character drinks. They are given four options — Wine, Vodka, Beer and Gin for the same.

People who have been passing around the photo of the question have made memes of it expressing their shock at a question about alcohol having found a place in a question paper for school students. A class XII student said that the question was from O. Henry’s short story The Last leaf, which is a text prescribed for them and is a part of their syllabus in their supplementary reader.

The poser was based on O. Henry’s short story The Last leaf, which is a prescribed text
title: Question on alcohol in English paper takes WhatsApp by storm
